trans-unit.source: Locations for Calendar Base event records.
trans-unit.target: Locations for Calendar Base event records.

trans-unit.source: The Location record facilitates the easy addition of repetitious locations, addresses, and even maps for your events.
trans-unit.target: The Location record facilitates the easy addition of repetitious locations, addresses, and even maps for your events.

trans-unit.source: Use this to temporarily exclude this location from display.
trans-unit.target: Use this to temporarily exclude this location from display.

trans-unit.source: The name of this location such as Office or Church.
trans-unit.target: The name of this location such as Office or Church.

trans-unit.source: A description of the location.
trans-unit.target: A description of the location.

trans-unit.source: The street address.
trans-unit.target: The street address.

trans-unit.source: The ZIP code or postal code of the location.
trans-unit.target: The ZIP code or postal code of the location.

trans-unit.source: The location's city.
trans-unit.target: The location's city.

trans-unit.source: The country of the location.
trans-unit.target: The country of the location.

trans-unit.source: The state of the location. The drop-down menu will not be available until you have included the country information and saved the form.
trans-unit.target: The state of the location. The drop-down menu will not be available until you have included the country information and saved the form.

trans-unit.source: The location's contact phone number.
trans-unit.target: The location's contact phone number.

trans-unit.source: The location's contact email address.
trans-unit.target: The location's contact email address.

trans-unit.source: A picture of the location or its logo.
trans-unit.target: A picture of the location or its logo.

trans-unit.source: An alternative website for the location.
trans-unit.target: An alternative website for the location.

trans-unit.source: Alternate text shown if images are not found or not supported.
trans-unit.target: Alternate text shown if images are not found or not supported.

trans-unit.source: If you have multiple images, alt text entries must be listed on separate lines.
trans-unit.target: If you have multiple images, alt text entries must be listed on separate lines.

trans-unit.source: Tooltip or hover text.
trans-unit.target: Tooltip or hover text.

trans-unit.source: If you have multiple images, title text entries must be listed on separate lines.
trans-unit.target: If you have multiple images, title text entries must be listed on separate lines.

trans-unit.source: Adds a caption beneath each image.
trans-unit.target: Adds a caption beneath each image.

trans-unit.source: If you have multiple images, captions must be listed on separate lines.
trans-unit.target: If you have multiple images, captions must be listed on separate lines.

trans-unit.source: Latitute and longitude of the location.
trans-unit.target: Latitute and longitude of the location.

trans-unit.source: Map of the location.
trans-unit.target: Map of the location.
